content: MFT-FOX HT M Bracket Horizontal fiberglass bracket - Medium ### Categories: Home > Products > Facade mounting systems > Brackets- - - ### FEATURES:Features Thermal bridge-free solution Glass-fiber reinforced plastic and aluminium compound for low thermal conductivity and high load performance Labor saving - Pre-assembled A4 screw for easy fastening of support profiles Up to 40 mm adjustability of the support profile Multiple fastening options â€“ can be installed using suitable anchors, screws or direct fastening (DX) Applications Suitable for low-energy buildings Suitable for low-energy buildings, Passivhaus and Minergie standard One-layer system with horizontally mounted support profiles Two-layer system with horizontally and vertically mounted substructure profiles ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Polyamide, EN AW-6063 T66 Width: 62 mm Height: 80 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Polyamide, EN AW-6063 T66 | Width | 62 mm | Height | 80 mm ### ITEMS- 2096993 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 140 M 5 - Package Size 25 pc - 2096994 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 140 M 6,5 - Package Size 25 pc - 2096995 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 140 M 11 - Package Size 25 pc - 2096996 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 160 M 5 - Package Size 25 pc - 2096997 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 160 M 6,5 - Package Size 25 pc - 2096998 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 160 M 11 - Package Size 25 pc - 2096999 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 180 M 5 - Package Size 25 pc - 2097000 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 180 M 6,5 - Package Size 25 pc - 2097001 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 180 M 11 - Package Size 25 pc - 2097002 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 200 M 5 - Package Size 25 pc - 2097003 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 200 M 6,5 - Package Size 25 pc - 2097004 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 200 M 11 - Package Size 25 pc
